content: Hi, I have gone through the categories that have been currently defined in ActivityDefinition , we have a UseCase where in we need to create tasks for our Nurse Advocates to create order, monitor status etc of patient. I checked the communication request which closely relates to task but task is much more comprehensive in the way we can track the state of the task and bring it to completion, also we are using BPM to automate our workflows and Task is the preferred resource that seems to be a good fit , can we request to add Task as one of the category?
That makes sense to me, and others have expressed similar use cases that would best fit with a Task. Make a tracker item?
Thanks Bryn, will create a tracker item!
